sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { User, Briefcase, TrendingUp, Users, CheckCircle, Search, FileText, Star, Award, Target, Calendar, Bell, Settings, ChevronRight, BarChart3, PieChart, Activity, Zap, Heart, Eye, MessageSquare, Plus, Filter, ArrowUp, ArrowDown, Clock } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, isJobSeeker } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); // Enhanced mock data with more metrics const mockJobSeekerData = { appliedJobs: 12, savedJobs: 8, profileViews: 25, responseRate: 67, interviewsScheduled: 3, profileCompleteness: 85, skillsEndorsed: 14, networkConnections: 127, recentApplications: [ { id: 1, title: 'Senior Frontend Developer', company: 'TechCorp', status: 'interview', appliedDate: '2024-01-15', salary: '$85,000', location: 'Remote', logo: 'ðŸ¢' }, { id: 2, title: 'React Developer', company: 'StartupXYZ', status: 'pending', appliedDate: '2024-01-10', salary: '$75,000', location: 'New York', logo: 'ðŸš€' }, { id: 3, title: 'Full Stack Engineer', company: 'BigTech Inc', status: 'under_review', appliedDate: '2024-01-05', salary: '$95,000', location: 'San Francisco', logo: 'ðŸ’»' } ], weeklyStats: [ { day: 'Mon', applications: 2 }, { day: 'Tue', applications: 1 }, { day: 'Wed', applications: 3 }, { day: 'Thu', applications: 0 }, { day: 'Fri', applications: 2 }, { day: 'Sat', applications: 1 }, { day: 'Sun', applications: 0 } ] }; const mockRecruiterData = { activeJobs: 5, totalApplications: 48, shortlistedCandidates: 12, hiringRate: 84, avgTimeToHire: 18, topPerformingJob: 'Senior Developer', recentJobs: [ { id: 1, title: 'Senior Frontend Developer', applications: 15, status: 'active', postedDate: '2024-01-12', views: 234, shortlisted: 5 }, { id: 2, title: 'Backend Developer', applications: 8, status: 'active', postedDate: '2024-01-10', views: 156, shortlisted: 3 }, { id: 3, title: 'UX Designer', applications: 22, status: 'closed', postedDate: '2024-01-08', views: 445, shortlisted: 8 } ] }; const data = isJobSeeker() ? mockJobSeekerData : mockRecruiterData; // Enhanced status colors and utility functions const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'pending': case 'active': return 'text-amber-700 bg-amber-100 border-amber-200'; case 'interview': return 'text-blue-700 bg-blue-100 border-blue-200'; case 'under_review': return 'text-indigo-700 bg-indigo-100 border-indigo-200'; case 'rejected': case 'closed': return 'text-red-700 bg-red-100 border-red-200'; case 'accepted': return 'text-emerald-700 bg-emerald-100 border-emerald-200'; default: return 'text-gray-700 bg-gray-100 border-gray-200'; } }; const ProgressBar = ({ value, max = 100, color = 'bg-blue-500', label }) => (
{label &&
{label} {value}%
}
); const MiniChart = ({ data, color = 'stroke-blue-500' }) => (
{data.map((value, index) => (
))}
); return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.firstName}!

{isJobSeeker() ? "Here's your job search overview" : "Here's your recruitment dashboard" }

{/* Stats Cards */}
{isJobSeeker() ? ( <>

Applied Jobs

{data.appliedJobs}

Saved Jobs

{data.savedJobs}

Profile Views

{data.profileViews}

Response Rate

67%

) : ( <>

Active Jobs

{data.activeJobs}

Total Applications

{data.totalApplications}

Shortlisted

{data.shortlistedCandidates}

Hiring Rate

84%

)}
{/* Recent Activity */}
{/* Recent Applications/Jobs */}

{isJobSeeker() ? 'Recent Applications' : 'Recent Job Posts'}

{data.recentJobs?.length > 0 ? (
{data.recentJobs.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{isJobSeeker() ? item.company : `${item.applications} applications`}

Applied {item.appliedDate}

{item.status}
))}
) : (

{isJobSeeker() ? "No applications yet. Start applying to jobs!" : "No jobs posted yet. Create your first job posting!" }

{isJobSeeker() ? "Browse Jobs" : "Post a Job"}
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{isJobSeeker() ? ( <> Browse Jobs Update Profile View Applications ) : ( <> Post New Job View Candidates Company Profile )}
); }; export default Dashboard;
